ordercallsection.sectionName: We will find the best solution
ordercallsection.heading: Contact us

notification.sentSuccessfully: Successfull, we will contact you soon!
notification.sentFailed: Failed to send message. Please try again.

cta.heading: Preparing for a vacation with us is very easy! Millions of trips to 80 countries - in a convenient search engine!
cta.motto: Take legendary tours with AFSONA TOUR

burjKhalifa.name: Burj Khalifa, Dubai
burjKhalifa.desctiption: UAE- Enjoy the beauty of the latest technology, modern city and tallest buildings

sharmelsheikh.name: Sharm El-Sheikh, Egypt
sharmelsheikh.desctiption: Sharm El Sheikh - Unforgettable beach impressions, feel the red sea

kualalumpur.name: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
kualalumpur.desctiption: Malaysia - Enjoy a family vacation in a year-round temperate climate, combining pure natural scenery and modern urban life

paris.name: Paris
paris.desctiption: Experience the charm of Paris, with famous sights like the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre. Enjoy the art, fashion, and food that make this city a must-see destination.

istanbul.name: Ä°stanbul, Turkey
istanbul.desctiption: Turkey - 10,000 plant and 80,000 animal species form the basis of 35 biodiversity in the world. Turkey is also a great place for flower lovers

safari.name: Safari, Dubai
safari.desctiption: Explore Dubai Safari, home to a wide variety of wildlife from around the world. Enjoy exciting safaris, get close to animals, and experience the beauty of nature in this unforgettable adventure.

thailand.name: Thailand
thailand.desctiption: Thailand, a country in Southeast Asia, is a wonderful blend of historical traditions and modern exuberance. Known for its wide range of travel experiences, stunning natural beauty and gracious hospitality, this country also has a rich cultural heritage.

georgia.name: Georgia
georgia.desctiption: There are ski resorts in the mountains of Georgia, sunny shores of the Black Sea and more than two thousand balneological resorts. Georgian cities are sure to leave an interesting impression on people who appreciate architecture and history, with their ancient buildings, museums and galleries.

Vietnam.name: Vietnam
Vietnam.desctiption: Vietnam - amazing prices and best of all you don't need a visa. This country is distinguished by the charm and uniqueness of traditions, you should definitely go there

tourlist.text1: Prepare for a vacation with us - millions of trips to 80 countries are available in a convenient search engine. Easily find the right type, pay in minutes. And our super service means you don't have to worry about anything while on vacation.
tourlist.text2: Want to get your feelings back? Then you should travel with us! We know what you need, we know what places you will visit and be amazed.

aboutus.heading: About our company
aboutus.headingtext: Travel to any country with "AFSONA TOUR" and win prizes and excursions through our bonus system. We are happy to serve you
aboutus.pricingpolicycontent: With AFSONA TOUR, you can travel around the world at the most affordable prices, paying in installments and even for free.
aboutus.alldayworkcontent: Order a call at any time, we will contact you shortly

AboutPage.title: About our company
AboutPage.text1: Hello, Thank you for choosing AFSONA TOUR.
AboutPage.text2: With AFSONA TOUR, you can travel around the world at the most affordable prices, paying in installments and even for free.
AboutPage.text3: Every month we give away gifts for our most active followers on our social networks.
AboutPage.text4: In addition, you can get bonuses for your next trip by telling your friends about your trip with AFSONA TOUR.
